<small>Hebrew form: **<big>[[H3318|יָצָא]]</big>**</small>
 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שׁיציא‎</span> [[BDB#Kt|Kt]], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שֵׁיצִי‎</span> [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] **verb** ==bring out== (to an end), ==finish== (probably **Shaph\`el** as loan-word from Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šû-ƒû, û-še-ƒû***</u></abbr>, ***bring out***, √ <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***aƒû***</u></abbr> (<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎וצא‎</span>, Biblical Hebrew <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎יצא‎</span>, = Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎יְעָא‎</span>, compare [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>GGA 1884, 1019</sup>), [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>l.c.</sup> [[BDB#Hpt|Hpt]]<sup>l.c.</sup> [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>l.c</sup>.; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שֵׁיצִי‎</span> ***complete, put an end to***, also ***come to an end***, passive ***be finished***, Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex. 205</sup>); — ***finish*** temple: ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Ezra.6.15|Ezra 6:15]], but read probably 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שֵׁיצִיו‎</span> [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 43, 1 near the end</sup> [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]] [[BDB#Gu|Gu]]<sup>Hpt</sup> (so [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]]); &gt; ***Perfect*** passive [[BDB#Be|BeRy]].
